Sentencas: Due to the time required to test fuel cell degradation experimentally, a physics-based model which can predict degradation can be a valuable tool.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Grain coarsening and the resulting microstructure evolution is a primary mode of degradation.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: In this study, a multi-physics model of a fuel cell is presented which can predict performance loss as a function of time caused by coarsening in the electrodes of an LSM-YSZ/YSZ/Ni-YSZ SOFC.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Microstructural properties are updated as a function of time from their initial values using functional relations derived from experimental data.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Specie and charge transport equations are solved to predict performance changes with time from the microstructural changes.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: The model is first calibrated such that it correctly captures the performance of a button cell.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Performance change over time predicted by the model is compared to experimental data for a cell operated for 775 hours.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: It is found that the model predicts a slower degradation rate than the rate which occurs experimentally.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: This is reasonable as other forms of degradation are not being accounted for.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: The model is then used to make long term predictions of cell performance loss due to grain coarsening out to 40,000 hours for various operating temperatures and initial microstructures.
Titulo: Performance Degradation Predictions Based on Microstructural Evolution Due to Grain Coarsening Effects in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes
